name: Parenthood Survivors
description:
. 

Fend off an endless onslaught of products, throwing out as much money as you can before they take you down, and then you have to try again.

Find more things by me (mostly comics) here.

CONTROLS

W, A, S, D
W - up
A - down
S- Left
D - Right
ESC - Pause

CREDITS

All of the art, programming, and design and everything by me - Mike Saver - following Greg Dev Stuff Tutorials to learn Unity, shout out to Greg and his Discord community for the help!

Music is from Jack Bros. Mecha Fortress for the VirtualBoy and sounds were gotten from mixkit.

HOW TO PLAY A ROGUELIKE

This is a roguelike game, which if you're not familiar, has a very simple structure.

Play. Die. Upgrade. Try again. Die a little bit later this time. Upgrade. Try again. Repeat.

MADE FOR LEARNINGZ

The game was made for the purpose of learning Unity and will be rough/unfinished in some parts, but enjoy! I'll try to keep continually working on and updating this as I can, but I am becoming a parent, and so will have less time to do so soon. Just go play the real Vampire Survivors if you like it.
